drone.job: The first manned landing on Phoebe was made by Martians eight years before the events of Leviathan Wakes, in order to be surveyed for ice mining (much like the rings of Saturn). When core samples from the moon were investigated, however, silicate samples were found, and the Martian government approached Protogen as a cosponsor of a long-term research facility. After .
